name: Dragon Realm
description:
You have struggled far and wide on your quest, and you could really go for a really good grilled cheese sandwich. Thank goodness you have made it to 2 caves, there may be a really good grilled cheese sandwich in one of those caves! How could you possibly pass up an opportunity like this!?

This is my first Python Project! I hope you enjoy this silly little game!

The correct path is always randomized!
